src:
America's most and least obese cities

01 Nov 2019, 06:09



We'll start with the top ten most obese cities, and coming in at number 10 is Augusta, Georgia.Augusta Convention and Visitors Bureau via CNN

Obesity now affects at least one-third of Americans. Find out which U.S. cities are the heaviest, and which are the skinniest.
